content.text:
# List of remastering software

The following is a list of remastering and slipstreaming software articles on Wikipedia:
Windows utilities
{| class = "wikitable"
! rowspan=2 | Name
! colspan=9 | Supported operating systems
|-
! Windows 2000 !! Windows XP !! Windows Server 2003 !! Windows Vista !! Windows 7 !! Windows Server 2008 !! Windows Server 2008 R2 !! Windows 8 !! Windows 10
|-
| 98lite ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||
|-
| Autostreamer ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||
|-
| XPLite ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||
|-
| HFSLIP ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||
|-
| DriverPacks ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||  ||
|}
-*Not fully supported.
Linux utilities
{| class="wikitable"
! Name !! Supported operating system  !!  Last Code Update !! Code Repositories/Forks
|-
| Mklivecd|| All Linux distributions || 2018-05-04 || GitHub [https://github.com/unity-linux/mklivecd]
|-
| MyLiveCD|| PCLinuxOS and derivatives || 2013-04-17 || Sourceforge [https://sourceforge.net/projects/mylivecd/]
|-
| Remastersys|| Debian and derivatives ||  2016-07-25 || GitHub [https://github.com/mutse/remastersys]
|}
